description.value: Energy runs through your blood more powerfully. When you use Energy Emanation, you can create an emanation of @Template[type:emanation|distance:5]{5 feet}, @Template[type:emanation|distance:10]{10 feet}, or @Template[type:emanation|distance:15]{15 feet}. The damage increases to @Damage[(6+max(0,@actor.level - 9))d6[@actor.flags.pf2e.elementalHeartDwarf.damageType]|traits:area-damage], instead of 1d6 plus an additional 1d6 for every 2 levels above 1st.
